name: 25Watts
description:
25Watts is an agency specialized in multimedia design, web, graphic, positioning, digital marketing, web programming and audio and video editing; In addition, we have a network of collaborators who help us and contribute in those projects that require the hand of a professional specialized in another related area.
Youth, experience, creativity, responsibility, professionalism and capacity for development are the attributes that characterize 25Watts and that are reflected in each of our projects.
